title: 85/508/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 November 1985 authorizing the French Republic to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of certain textile products, originating in Turkey, which have been put into free circulation in the Community (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 4 November 1985
authorizing the French Republic to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of certain textile products, originating in Turkey, which have been put into free circulation in the Community
(Only the French text is authentic)
(85/508/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The French Republic is authorized to introduce until 31 July 1986 and in accordance with Decision 80/47/EEC, intra-Community surveillance of imports of the textile products falling within the following categories, originating in Turkey and put into free circulation in the other Member States.
Textile products for which categories have been established (1)

This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 November 1985.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
